name: UPTRAVI ® 1200 microgram
treatmentDescriptions: Uptravi is indicated for the long-term treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) in adult patients with WHO functional class (FC) II-III, either as combination therapy in patients insufficiently controlled with an endothelin receptor antagonist (ERA) and/or a phosphodiesterase type 5 (PDE-5) inhibitor, or as monotherapy in patients who are not candidates for these therapies.Efficacy has been shown in a PAH population including idiopathic and heritable PAH, PAH associated with connective tissue disorders, and PAH associated with corrected simple congenital heart disease
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת

aiResolution.reasoning: The option 2 matches the medication with a similar brand name (UPTRAVI), strength (1200 microgram), and registration number (158 12 34943 00).
